name: The Lord of the Wheel of Destiny
author: Can I give you my life
content: A planet called Ghost Star suddenly appeared, causing the earth&#039s animals and plants to evolve into monsters that can destroy humans. At the time of human extinction, people accidentally discovered a way to log into the ghost star, and found that they could gain power against monsters on the ghost star. So in order to survive, human beings started the era of exploring ghost stars...
